Sorry if this seems like I'm speeding things, but this is kinda begining to 
hold things up.

::Zardus/DevilDuer::

Zardus smiles as the console reports the reprogramming being complete. 
Squizzy (he got her name from her old proccessor) was programmed to be loyal 
to him, and the other ussual precautions.

He flips a switch, the computer attempting to take her out of stasis lock.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
DevilDuer nods. "Yeah, might as well. Let's go!"

He walks into the base, motioning for her to follow.
